title: Modern 2Bed in Lakeview
posting_body:
Pet: Pet Friendly
  • Rent Includes:: Water
  • Parking:: no parking
Stunning 2-bed/1-bath located in the heart of Northalsted!
Unit has hardwood flooring throughout, central air, stainless steel appliances, a sunroom and much more!
Just steps from Halsted bus stops, and a short walk to both Addison and Belmont red line stations!
Rent includes water and refuse/recycling and tenant is responsible for electricity and gas - pet-friendly building with a $20/month pet rent!

FEATURES

  • Central Air
  • Dishwasher
  • Eat-In Kitchen
  • Gas Range
  • Hardwood Floors
  • Laundry in Building
  • Newly Remodeled
  • Pets OK
  • Remodeled Bathroom
  • Remodeled Kitchen
  • Stainless appliances
  • Water included
<i> Note: Photos may display another unit.
Please contact us with any comments/questions or to schedule a showing today!!
** Please note: the move-in date is stated, we do NOT allow earlier move-ins.
